inclusion.criterion: surgery department of Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: full informed consent will be obtained from each eligible patient before enrolment into the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: demographic and patient data will be recorded during recruitment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: medical history including any comorbidities or prior surgical intervention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: routine laboratory tests including: Haemogram, Liver function tests, Renal function tests, Coagulogram
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: base line arterial blood gases with lactate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: haemoglobin level will be maintained at 8gm/dl on CPB and 10gm/dl before separation from bypass
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: arterial blood gases (ABG) before induction, ABG five minutes after CPB, ABG at the end of the termination of CPB, ABG after half an hour stay in the ICU soon after the patient is shifted from completion of surgery, ABG before the patient is extubated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: additives and their amounts added to the prime to correct acidosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intra operative aortic cross clamp time, duration of bypass
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: post operative investigations haemogram, liver function tests, renal function tests and coagulogram at interval of 12 hours, 24 hours and 48 hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients undergoing surgery for congenital heart diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients of age less than 18 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with severe left ventricular dysfunction with ejection fraction <30%
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients undergoing cardiac surgeries in emergency conditions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients undergoing CABG along with heart valve replacement or repair
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
